metadata.Description: A composite statistic of life expectancy, education, and per capita income indicators, which are used to rank countries into four tiers of human development.

human development index.Description: The human development index implements the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote sustainable energy practices.
The human development index funds renewable energy projects to support the transition to clean energy sources.
The human development index focuses on improving access to clean energy for all communities.
The human development index is a part of the Sustainable Energy Hub initiative.
The human development index partners with the International Renewable Energy Agency to promote renewable energy solutions.
The human development index contributes to climate change mitigation efforts through sustainable energy practices.
The human development index monitors energy consumption patterns to identify areas for improvement.
The human development index targets achieving universal energy access for all individuals.
The human development index addresses energy poverty by promoting affordable and sustainable energy solutions.
